title: Life Expectancy in the United States Declining, Thanks to Obamacare
subtitle: Some outlets have implied a connection between an annually-released actuarial study lowering a prediction of future increases to U.S. life expectancy and the implementation of the Affordable Care Act, but this logic is specious at best.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Life expectancy in the United States is now lower because of Obamacare.
